name: TORRA
description:
Story

Our protagonist, Torra, wakes up on a mysterious island. Can you escape the island or will you be terminate by the creatures that live there?

Controls

In the title screen and pause menu:

Change option--------Arrow keys

Select an option-----Space_bars OR Enter

In the game:

Movement------------Arrow keys

Attack----------------Space_bars

Dash-----------------C

Pause----------------Esc

Use Inventory-------Numbers 1-7

Special occasions:

Save game (Near campfire)---S

Buy Item (At Shop)-----------B

Range Attack (Once unlock)---X

Items

Apple - You can't eat it, but you can place them on the ground

Red Potion - It heals you

Green Potion - It repels nearby enemies

Yellow Potion - Shorter cool-down on your range attack for a few seconds

Blue Potion - Gives you super speed for a few seconds

Bomb - It blows up, hurting nearby enemies

Shield - Protects you only from projectiles

Tips & Other Info

Save game every-time you get the change

Complete quests for rewards

Adjust the volume in the pause menu

Check-out the pause menu after finding a chest

Stay vigilant during night-time
